title: Athletism — Rowing (Elite) — Phase 1: GPP & Technical Reset
goal: Restore stroke mechanics, build robust aerobic base, address asymmetries and tissue capacity.

warmup: Technical drills: pick drill / pause @ arms-only / legs-only
main: UT2 row 3x18' @18 spm, 2' easy; HR Z1–2
Boat technical: rate-capped 4x12' @18–20 spm, focus on catch timing
Strength (full-body): 4x6 Back Squat @RPE7, 3x8 RDL, 3x10 Single-leg row
cooldown: Light stretching (Posterior chain, lats, hip flexors)

notes: Week 1: Volume foundation at low intensity (UT2/Zone 1–2). Week 2: +8–10% volume; technical density ↑ (more drill-to-stroke ratios).
